00035 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00036 #include "config.h"

00039 #ifdef _SOLARIS
00040 #include "solaris_port.h"
00041 #endif

00043 #include <stdio.h>
00044 #include <string.h>
00045 #include <pthread.h>
00046 #include "nfs_core.h"
00047 #include "log.h"
00048 #include "cache_inode.h"
00049 #include "fsal.h"
00050 #include "9p.h"
00051 
00052 int _9p_unlinkat( _9p_request_data_t * preq9p, 
00053                 void  * pworker_data,
00054                 u32 * plenout, 
00055                 char * preply)
00056 {
00057   char * cursor = preq9p->_9pmsg + _9P_HDR_SIZE + _9P_TYPE_SIZE ;
00058 
00059   u16  * msgtag   = NULL ;
00060   u32  * dfid     = NULL ;
00061   u16  * name_len = NULL ;
00062   char * name_str = NULL ;
00063    __attribute__((unused)) u32  * flags    = NULL ; /* for unused-but-set-variable */
00064 
00065   _9p_fid_t * pdfid = NULL ;
00066 
00067   fsal_attrib_list_t    fsalattr ;
00068   cache_inode_status_t  cache_status ;
00069   fsal_name_t           name ;
00070 
00071   if ( !preq9p || !pworker_data || !plenout || !preply )
00072    return -1 ;
00073 
00074   /* Get data */
00075   _9p_getptr( cursor, msgtag, u16 ) ; 
00076 
00077   _9p_getptr( cursor, dfid,   u32 ) ; 
00078   _9p_getstr( cursor, name_len, name_str ) ;
00079   _9p_getptr( cursor, flags,  u32 ) ;
00080 
00081   LogDebug( COMPONENT_9P, "TUNLINKAT: tag=%u dfid=%u name=%.*s",
00082             (u32)*msgtag, *dfid, *name_len, name_str ) ;
00083 
00084   if( *dfid >= _9P_FID_PER_CONN )
00085    return _9p_rerror( preq9p, msgtag, ERANGE, plenout, preply ) ;
00086 
00087   pdfid = &preq9p->pconn->fids[*dfid] ;
00088 
00089   /* Let's do the job */
00090   snprintf( name.name, FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN, "%.*s", *name_len, name_str ) ;
00091   name.len = *name_len + 1 ;
00092 
00093   if( cache_inode_remove( pdfid->pentry,
00094                           &name,
00095                           &fsalattr,
00096                           &pdfid->fsal_op_context,
00097                           &cache_status) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00098     return _9p_rerror( preq9p, msgtag, _9p_tools_errno( cache_status ), plenout, preply ) ;
00099 
00100   /* Build the reply */
00101   _9p_setinitptr( cursor, preply, _9P_RUNLINKAT ) ;
00102   _9p_setptr( cursor, msgtag, u16 ) ;
00103 
00104   _9p_setendptr( cursor, preply ) ;
00105   _9p_checkbound( cursor, preply, plenout ) ;
00106 
00107   LogDebug( COMPONENT_9P, "TUNLINKAT: tag=%u dfid=%u name=%.*s",
00108             (u32)*msgtag, *dfid, *name_len, name_str ) ;
00109 
00110   return 1 ;
00111 }
